dct_title_s: Plan of Jerusalem from the ordnance survey
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and spot heights.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Miles".
Shows topography, drainage, roads, places of historical interest.
Descriptive text: The figures denote the height in feet above the Mediterranean Sea.
